product-info.opis: Ustna voda Biodent Herbal je razvita na osnovi blagodejnih zelišč. Blaži vnetja ustne votline, krepi dlesni in ščiti zobe. Za svež dah.

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, ALCOHOL, GLYCERIN, SORBITOL, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA EXTRACT, SALVIA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, MELISSA OFFICINALIS EXTACT, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA EXTRACT, POTENTILLA ERECTA EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, ALLANTOIN, SODIUM FLUORIDE, SODIUM BENZOATE, PROPYLPARABEN, BENZOIC ACID, SODIUM SACCHARIN, AROMA, CI 19140, CI 28440, CI 42051.
